document.discussion_title: Reminder: Clothes for Kids back-to-school shopping starts Aug. 24 | MLTnews.com
document.topic_text: Cancel reply SHOP AMAZON and support us! If you shop at Amazon, please visit there by clicking here . We’ll get a small commission on your purchase(s), which helps support MLTnews . Consider bookmarking this page for your future Amazon purchases. Today’s Deals at Amazon.com. Subscribe to our newsletter -- sent daily at 4 AM! Email Address : Recent Comments victor eskenazi on Brier officer says he was fired for responding to Mukilteo shooting (4) according to the mayor's letter - the chief was available by cell phone http://mltnews.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/Brier-statement-regarding-D-Anderson_5716778_ver1.0.pdf seems to me anyone "on duty" is expected to remain "on... – Aug 21, 10:53 PM Tony Aversano on Brier officer says he was fired for responding to Mukilteo shooting (4) From the Times article... He said he did not alert his supervisor, which he admits is called for by policy, because it was the middle... – Aug 21, 11:26 AM Linda Stromeyer on EdCC launches Spanish-language website for prospective Latino students (10) Why should we drop we are #1? Look what DIEversity has done to Europe and is doing to the US. – Aug 21, 10:10 AM Linda Stromeyer on EdCC launches Spanish-language website for prospective Latino students (10) First of all I am Miss not Ms and second of all I can tell by your comment that you are anti-white, etc. so I... – Aug 21, 10:08 AM Eiya Wolfe on EdCC launches Spanish-language website for prospective Latino students (10) One more comment: People in most other countries are fluent in more than one language, which puts us to shame (do Ryan Lochte and his... – Aug 21, 9:55 AM Eiya Wolfe on EdCC launches Spanish-language website for prospective Latino students (10) Ms. Stromeyer, allow me to offer a bit of historical irony here: In the 1500-1600's most European (primarily English and Spanish) "immigrants" to the American... – Aug 21, 9:43 AM victor eskenazi on Brier officer says he was fired for responding to Mukilteo shooting (4) i noticed there was NO mention - did he just take off? OR did he check with dispatch first??? did he notify dispatch - dispatch,... – Aug 20, 4:42 PM Kathy Peterson on EdCC launches Spanish-language website for prospective Latino students (10) Yes Ms. Stromeyer,, you might try living in diversity, what's the saying: try it, you'll like it! It takes effort on your behalf to do... – Aug 20, 11:47 AM Tony Aversano on Brier officer says he was fired for responding to Mukilteo shooting (4) Tough call... you obviously have to like the idea of going to the other officers aid. But when you're the only person patrolling your area... – Aug 19, 11:36 AM Kimberly Slone on EdCC launches Spanish-language website for prospective Latino students (10) Thank you! it's wonderful having so many interesting, different people for friends, and It would be so boring if everyone were exactly like me. – Aug 19, 7:33 AM Linda Stromeyer on EdCC launches Spanish-language website for prospective Latino students (10) Good luck with living in diversity. – Aug 18, 9:09 AM Community News for Mountlake Terrace Contact us: Commenting Policy We welcome comments on all posts at MLTnews. To encourage constructive community dialogue, all commenters must use their real names, first and last. Comments from users with names that don't comply with this policy will be removed. To be fair, this includes comments from longstanding readers who in the past have used just one name. We ask that you re-register on the site to include your full name.
